Judul: READINESS ASSESSMENT OF SOEKARNO-HATTA INDONESIA GATEWAY BASED ON SKYTEAM CRITERIA
Abstrak: Basically, Soekarno-Hatta international airport as Indonesia Gateway program means that any flights that have a destination to any town in Indonesia can make its transit in Soekarno-Hatta International Airport and not using other airports such as Changi (Singapore) and Incheon (South Korea) as their transit point. Based on the research using scoring and gap analysis, writer found that there are several item in SkyTeam criteria that cannot be fulfilled by PT X as the owner of Soekarno-Hatta International Airport such as drop zone management and terminal facilities.
Kontributor / Dosen Pembimbing: Pembimbing: Dr. Mursyid Hasan Basri, S.T., M.T.
Kata Kunci: Gap Analysis, Airport Service, SkyTeam Criteria
